<!--- Please direct any generic questions related to SliDesk to the SliDesk repository -->
<!--- Before opening up a new bug report, please make sure to check for similar existing issues -->

**Description:** A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Theme version:** Specify the theme version

**SliDesk version:** Specify the SliDesk version

**Platform:**

- [ ] Ubuntu
- [ ] macOS
- [ ] Windows

**Repro steps:**
A description with steps to reproduce the issue. If you have a public example or
repository to share, please provide the link.

**Expected behavior:** A description of what you expected to happen.

**Actual behavior:** A description of what is actually happening.

**Screenshots:** If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
